casebody.data:
In re HILLSIDE MEN’S SHOP, Inc., Bankrupt. Abraham Saffir, Appellant, Henry E. Coleman, Appellee. No. 491. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 9, 1934. Cohen & Wedeen, of New York City (Sidney Wedeen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Edward Gettinger, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
